A bespoke dining table sits beneath sculptural Audo Copenhagen wall lights, lending a soft glow to the moodier palette. <PARA> The rear space opens dramatically into a double-height living area, where sunlight pours through floor-to-ceiling glass. Soft neutrals, bespoke furniture and internal windows draw light from the double-height void. The principal bedroom features a custom headboard in Mark Alexander fabric, with New Works wall lights adding sculptural accents. Elsewhere, two bathrooms serve the home. The ground-floor shower room pairs RAK Blu del Belgio tiles with a Tikamoon marble basin; upstairs, the main bathroom channels a softer aesthetic with a Carrara marble-topped vanity and a generous shower with a tiled bench. <PARA> Residents also enjoy an exceptional lifestyle offering. Included are all utilities and “Spirit” tier membership to The Sanctuary: home to the UK’s second-largest sauna, a cold-plunge room, the plant-based café Palm Greens, alcohol-free elixir bar Karmaceuticals, a co-working hub, community events, and a full programme of classes and workshops. <PARA> Location <PARA> Set just off Brick Lane, this apartment sits at the crossroads of Shoreditch’s creativity. Designed for chic-city living, the level of attention to this apartment is nothing short of perfection. As you meander through the apartment you can't help but notice the exquisite finishing that the developer Regal Homes & architect ACME have Incorporated, whether its the gorgeous oak engineered wood flooring laid in a Chevron pattern or the white marble basins found in the bathrooms, every material used has an exact purpose that beautifully complements one another to create a calming environment in the heart of the world's greatest city. <PARA> As you enter the apartment the first thing that strikes you is the blinding light offered partly in thanks to the flawless floor to ceiling windows that allow the light and air to fill every corner of the living room. This open plan space has been designed for those who love to entertain; with a compact kitchen which comes with Miele fitted appliances including induction hob, oven, warming draw, wine cooler and family sized dishwasher. As you walk past the elegant kitchen you find yourself in the spacious living area where this space seamlessly connects with your Juliet balcony. The bedroom area is nicely divided and unlike any Manhattan apartments offers plenty of built in storage. <PARA> The bathroom is a refined havens where white sanitaryware is beautifully complemented by contemporary satin nickel brassware. A white, marble basin with incorporating draws below can also be found adding to the number of smart storage options including shelving behind the integral vanity mirror. The deep bathtub also comes with dual shower fittings as well as a fully integrated Aquavision TV. <PARA> The entire apartment is heated via zoned underfloor heating and independently programmed comfort cooling. As a resident of The Haydon not only do you get a bespoke and timeless apartment you also get a host of resident exclusive amenities including 24/7 concierge, fourteen person cinema room, state-of-the-art gym, yoga studio, spa pool and communal roof terrace. <PARA> The Haydon is perfectly placed to allow you to travel across the City with ease. You are only a two minute walk from Aldgate station or 5 minutes from Liverpool Street station providing you access to nearly every underground line within London. With these local connections you are only 45 minutes door to door to either London Heathrow or London City airport. <PARA> Disclaimer <PARA> These particulars are intended to give a fair description of the property but their accuracy cannot be guaranteed and they do not constitute an offer of contract. Intending purchasers must rely on their own inspection of the property. <PARA> None of the above appliances/services have been tested by Romans & Partners. We recommend purchasers arrange for a qualified person to check all appliances/services before making any legal commitment.

description: A rare opportunity to live in this luxury new-build 2-bedroom apartment in the heart of London's Zone 1, located within the prestigious Postmark development. Positioned at the crossroads of two of London's most iconic postcodes-EC1 and WC1-this home forms part of the only large-scale residential project in this highly central location. Built on the historic site of the Royal Mail's Mount Pleasant sorting office, Postmark pays tribute to its heritage through refined architecture and contemporary design. <PARA> With 883 sq ft of south-east-facing space, this apartment showcases carefully considered interiors, complete with elegant wood flooring, high-specification fittings, tasteful finishes, and a private balcony-offering a refined urban living environment. Available now. <PARA> Residents enjoy a wealth of exclusive amenities, including access to a 6,000 sqft luxury Wellness Centre with an 18-metre swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, steam room, gym, fitness studio, and treatment room. The development also features a private cinema, residents' lounge, co-working and event space, and beautifully landscaped residents-only gardens. The 24/7 concierge service and secure, design-led environment enhance the sense of comfort and convenience. <PARA> Postmark is surrounded by cultural and educational landmarks. Just minutes away are the British Museum, British Library, Barbican Centre, and the vibrant streets of Exmouth Market. For shopping and entertainment, residents can easily reach Covent Garden and the creative hub of Old Street. The development is also ideally placed near top-ranked schools such as Westminster School (18 mins), Queen's College Preparatory School (22 mins), and the City of London School for Girls (25 mins). Within walking distance are world-renowned universities including UCL (20 mins), LSE (23 mins), KCL (27 mins), Central Saint Martins (26 mins), and UAL (16 mins), making it a top choice for students, professionals, and families alike. <PARA> Transport links are exceptional. Surrounded by five major stations-Farringdon, Chancery Lane, Russell Square, Holborn, and King's Cross St Pancras-all within a 15-minute walk, Postmark offers unmatched connectivity across London and beyond. Residents enjoy easy access to seven Underground lines, the Elizabeth Line, and Eurostar routes from St Pancras International. From business in the City to leisure in Hyde Park or weekend escapes to Paris, travel is seamless and efficient. This is London living at its most connected, most cultural, and most convenient.
